column1: Cross-window communication with unrestricted target origin
column2: When sending sensitive information to another window using `postMessage`, the origin of the target window should be restricted to avoid unintentional information leaks.
column4: [["Sensitive data"|"relative:///VulnFinder-CodeQL-main/src/javascript-cwe/CWE-201/examples/PostMessageStar.js:1:27:1:34"]] is sent to another window without origin restriction.
